meta_description: The Hofstra University Museum of Art initiates and facilitates rich and varied cultural and artistic explorations in an atmosphere that promotes the open exchange of ideas.
hours_text:
## Experience the Hofstra Feel

Between the excitement of New York City and the beaches of Long Island, Hofstra offers the best of both worlds. Our campus is just 25 miles from Manhattan and features green quads, modern labs, and spaces built for learning and connection. When you visit, you’ll see where you’ll live, learn, and grow. The city, the shore, and your future are all within reach. 

[Schedule a Campus Visit](https://admission.hofstra.edu/portal/info-tour?_gl=1*1c8pt0i*_gcl_au*NDEwNjQxMzYwLjE3NTAxMDQwNTYuMTcwMTcxNjE1My4xNzUzMzkzNTg4LjE3NTMzOTM1ODg)

[T](https://www.hofstra.edu/admission/virtual-tour.html)[ake a Virtual Tour](/admission/virtual-tour/)

[Explore Upcoming Events](/admission/visit/upcoming-events/)

## Campus Tours and Info Sessions

accessibility_text:
Here to Help

# Accessibility

## Technology Concerns

If you are having any difficulty using this website, please contact the ITS Service Desk at [help@hofstra.edu](mailto:help@hofstra.edu) or by calling [516-463-7777](tel:1-516-463-7777). Please identify the webpage address or URL and the specific problems you have encountered and we will address the issue.

## Disability Concerns

If you have a disability-related question regarding accessing the website, contact Student Access Services at [SAS@hofstra.edu](mailto:SAS@hofstra.edu) or call [516-463-7075](tel:1-516-463-7075).

[Visit Student Access Services' Website](/student-access-services/)

Here to Help

collections_text:
Hofstra University

# Museum of Art

Advances knowledge and understanding through experiences with authentic works of art

[Become a Member](/museum/membership.html) [Become a Friend](https://www.givecampus.com/campaigns/34380/donations/new)

## Exhibitions

#### Lowe Gallery

### _Our Unfinished Revolution(s)_

An exhibition commemorating the 250th anniversary of the Declaration of Independence.

[Learn More](/museum/our-unfinished-revolutions.html)

### Upcoming Exhibitions

See what we have in store for you!

[Learn more](/museum/exhibitions.html)

#### A Look Back

### Past Exhibitions

Check out the exhibitions that once graced the Hofstra University Museum of Art.

[See Past Exhibitions](/museum/exhibitions.html#past)

#### Visit from Home

### Virtual Museum

The Museum staff has included a number of virtual resources for you to explore from home, including digital art exhibitions from our school  
partners!

[Visit the Virtual Museum](/museum/virtual.html)

### Support the Arts

Your support helps sustain the Museum’s extraordinary level of programming, conservation, research, and inspiring exhibitions.

[Become a member](/museum/membership.html)

## Programs

The Hofstra University Museum of Art offers programs for students, educators, families, and the community, connecting visitors with art in new and educational ways.

  * [Museum Calendar](/museum/calendar.html)
  * [Family Fun](/museum/family-fun.html)

## Collection

The collection contains more than 5,200 work...
